pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/chestm007/amdgpu-fan.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/chestm007/amdgpu-fan) # Fan controller for amdgpusIf you experience problems please create an issue.## installation:### pip`sudo pip3 install .`### Arch linuxAvailable in the aur as `amdgpu-fan`## usage: `sudo amdgpu-fan` ## configuration:```# /etc/amdgpu-fan.yml# eg:speed_matrix: # -[temp(*C), speed(0-100%)]- [0, 0]- [40, 30]- [60, 50]- [80, 100]# optional# cards: # can be any card returned from # # ls /sys/class/drm | grep "^card[[:digit:]]$"# - card0```
